75481.summary: Some customers in the Rockwood area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
75481.title: Apr 19 - Winnipeg (Rockwood) | All Services - Outage (Resovled)

75494.summary: Some customers in the London Road area of Lethbridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
75494.title: Apr 19 - Lethbridge (London Road) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
